modulesApplication.tests.integration.models.test_programmes_model module¶

class modulesApplication.tests.integration.models.test_programmes_model.TestProgrammes(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: django.test.testcases.TransactionTestCase

Test cases for the Programmes data model.

tags = {'integration'}¶
test_no_duplicate_pks()¶

Tests that the primary key constraint behaves as expected.

test_unique_title()¶

Tests that an IntegrityError is raised when the unique constraint on title is violated. This is enforced at the database level AND validation level.

test_valid_degree_levels_at_database()¶

Test that valid degree levels are saved successfully, and that invalid ones are not. Checked at the database level.

test_valid_degree_levels_at_model()¶

Tests that programmes saved at the model/form level have valid degree levels. Objects saved via a ModelForm are subjected to clean(), so this method tests that.

test_yini()¶

Tests that saving fields with different YINI values behaves as expected.
